channel.title: Git on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Git on jverkamp.com

item.title: Removing large files from git history
item.description:
A couple of quick additions to my dotfiles today:

  • git find-fat - find large files that no longer exist
  • git trim-fat - remove files entirely from git history

item.title: Git aliases: undo, ud, and wipe
item.description:
A few new git aliases:

  • git undo - Undo the most recent commit, unstaging all new files
  • git up - Update remote branches and submodules, delete merged branches
  • git wipe - Remove all current changes, saving as a seperate branch
